descriptions.location: The bathroom is well-equipped but is in a dreadful state. There is a brass bathtub, tarnished and dull. The mirror above the sink has been shattered, as have a number of the tiles on the walls.

descriptions.detailed: Shards of the broken mirror lie in the sink. Several of them appear to be stained with dried blood. Someone hurt themself when they broke this mirror.
The brass bathtub is deep but, as with so much in this house, it has lost its lustre. A few inches of stagnant water can be seen at the bottom of the tub.
The mirror hangs above the sink but has been broken. One small piece remains in the wooden frame.
